name: WP Tools Divi Blog Carousel
author: WP Tools

sections.description:
Plugin depreciated. No further development planned for this plugin. Only maintenance and compatibility updates will be issued

Use our Ultimate Carousel For Divi plugin. It has better functionality.

The WP Tools Divi Blog Carousel plugin provides a divi module for cycling through blog or post items.

Show your featured blog posts on a carousel using the Divi Blog Carousel module.

This plugin requires Divi Theme (Affiliate link) be installed and activated.

WP Tools Divi Blog Carousel module provides following functionality.

  • Full visual builder and backend builder support.
  • Select unlimited number of blogs for the carousel. Order blog items with drag and drop.
  • Set number of blog item per slide for desktop view. (Premium version allows you to set the items on tablet and mobile view)
  • Dot navigation (Set the ability to show/hide and apply color in premium version)
  • Arrow navigation (Set the ability to show/hide and apply color in premium version)

Premium version features

Premium plugin

  • Full visual builder and back-end builder support.
  • Add unlimited number of blogs. Set the blog order with drag and drop.
  • Set the number of visible blogs for desktop, tablet and mobile view. Make your carousel fully responsive.
  • Ability to set a slide as default.
  • Set carousel motion settings like infinite loops, auto-play, play speed and hover events.
  • Toggle dot/arrow carousel navigation and set their colors.
  • Ability to set rounded corners for slide.
  • Ability to apply border style to slide.
  • Ability to apply box shadow to slide.
  • Ability to set padding for slide.
  • Custom css for
    • Slide
    • Blog Image
    • Blog Title
    • Arrow navigation and pseudo :before
    • Dot navigation and pseudo :before
    • Active dot navigation and pseudo :before
sections.installation:
1. Goto your WordPress Admin > Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for wp-tools-divi-blog-carousel.
  3. Install and activate plugin (with the author as wpt00ls)
sections.faq:
Are there are any dependencies for this plugin

No, there are no dependencies for this plugin.
